title: jaya jaya shree brihannaayaki
sahitya:
jaya jaya shrI bruhannAyaki
hayagrIvAnuja  karuNArasamukhi
(jaya)


anupallavi

bhaya nivAraNa shivE bhavAni
dhaya tO nanu  brOvavE nAraNI amba
(jaya) 


caraNam

pATalIsha hrut kamalasthihE bhava
bAdhalanu pAragrolu dharmavati
nIdu mahima gananAtharamu kADanucu
nAdha alankrtamunu svIkarimcu
